subject: refactor: split tabs.js into modules, add template helpers, complete event delegation
body:
Document the vanilla JS architecture decision in ADR-001. Extract repeated
urgency/impact bar HTML into renderUrgencyBar() and renderImpactBar() helpers.
Migrate all remaining addEventListener with init flags into the single delegated
handler on #dashboard. Split the 2,100-line tabs.js into 10 focused modules
under js/tabs/ with a barrel re-export for backward compatibility.
